website_summaries.verdict: Between the large number of pieces, detailed vehicles, and mix of DC Comics heroes and villains, this is a LEGO set that’ll keep creative minds entertained for a while.
pros: Build Batman’s Batwing, Riddler’s helicopter, and Commissioner Gordon’s police car
Includes Batman, Riddler, SHAZAM!, and Commissioner Gordon minifigures
cons: A fairly pricy LEGO set that sells out often (but comes back in stock)

customer_reviews.title: Commissioner Gordon! Shazam!
customer_reviews.text: Great minifig selection. The police car and riddler helicopter builds are ok, but the batwing is great for an 89-inspired design, the play features are reasonably well integrated and easy to remove, and it fits into a slot on the newest batcave set if you have that.the price is also reasonable for a license set.
customer_reviews.author: James Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun build plus it’s batman. My five year old plays with it all the time. The helicopter is a little sensitive the rest is pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kris & Erica Day

customer_reviews.title: Good set for fans of Lego heroes
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Great gift for young fans of batman. 7 year old son had fun building it. Then lots of fun playing with it afterwards. You get a few mini figures and their vehicles so you can recreate some of your favorite movie scenes.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great lego set
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sons 13th Birthday, he loves it. It took him about 2 hours to put together. He said that he would highly recommend to anyone that likes batman and legos.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Lots and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I decided to gift this to my 11 year old nephew. I must say that it has been lots and lots of fun for him to build this set. In the current world of digital entertainment, this Lego set provided him hours and hours of enjoyment. Worth buying and gifting....
customer_reviews.author: BookFanatic

customer_reviews.title: Legos really do hurt my feelings
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome my two little shoes lock this thing and I stepped on them every day I really want to step on thank you for making me stuff for Legos oh and by the way Legos we do hurt when you take them out without shoes anyway great so thank you for this anyway I’m going to be leaving so see you later
customer_reviews.author: Wise goose

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: Legos Batman sets are terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson put the Legos together and is playing with the figures - very good!

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego.

customer_reviews.title: I can’t go wrong gifting legos
customer_reviews.text: I can’t go wrong giving Legos to my 8 yr old

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to Batman collection.
customer_reviews.text: This one was fun putting together with my daughter. It's also a good addition to the collection. Only down fall, I wish the Batwing was a little bigger.

customer_reviews.title: LEGO fun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build, super easy, not too many pieces but great item. Batwing can be added to the bat cave section 76122!!!

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It has great characters but the vehicles are not sturdy. The Batwing and Jim gordans car isn't sturdy it has a bad base and falls apart easily. I can't play with it because it falls apart so easily I even can't put it for show I'm dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what he wanted. It came just in time too. It was a Christmas gift for the angel giving tree to share with a child in need.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: The price was awesome. Sound is great. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 7-year-old grandon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this batman lego set for my 7 year old grandson who loves Batman. He loved it. I think that it was his favorite Birthday present.

customer_reviews.title: good for kids

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money

customer_reviews.title: LEGOs are always good for gift giving

product_meta.title: LEGO DC Batman: Batman Batwing and The Riddler Heist 76120 Building Kit (489 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Kids can dream up their own exciting adventures with this LEGO DC Batman 76120 Batman Batwing and The Riddler Heist playset. The iconic LEGO Batwing building toy has cool features and functions to thrill Batman fans including new-for-August-2019 rapid-fire multi shooters and shooters which can shoot tiles or studs. This Batman toy playset also includes The Riddler’s helicopter with a chain and hook to attach to a lockable safe containing cash and gem elements, and Commissioner Gordon’s police car to play out a robbery getaway and pursuit. The best birthday gift for Batman-loving kids, it also includes 4 minifigures with weapons, plus 10 assorted Action Pack elements to customize builds, minifigures and weapons.
feature_bullets: Build the LEGO Batwing with new-for-2019 multi shooters, a police car, a lockable safe and a flick-missile-shooting helicopter to role-play Batman and the police’s pursuit of robber The Riddler!
This Batman LEGO set includes 4 minifigures: Batman, The Riddler, SHAZAM! and Commissioner Gordon figures with assorted weapons and 10 Bat elements to customize builds, minifigures and weapons
489 pieces – LEGO Batman toy playset for boys and girls aged 7+ and the best super-hero gift for fans and kids of all ages
This LEGO DC Batman : Batman Batwing and The Riddler Heist 76120 super-hero playset can be built together with all other original LEGO construction toys and LEGO bricks for creative play

Collectible brick-built Batwing measures over 1” (5cm) high, 6” (17cm) long and 7” (19cm) wide Police car measures over 1” (4cm) high, 5” (14cm) long and 1” (5cm) wide Helicopter measures over 3” (8cm) high, 7” (20cm) long and 1” (4cm) wide.
